src:
Live Streaming Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan di Vidio
05 Nov 2019, 23:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund menjamu Inter Milan dalam lanjutan fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 matchday keempat di Signal Iduna Park, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Borussia Dortmund mengusung misi pembalasan saat meladeni Inter Milan. Pada matchday sebelumnya, Dortmund menyerah 0-2 di markas Inter. Gol-gol Lautaro Martinez dan Antonio Candreva memaksa Dortmund takluk di hadapan Inter.
Dortmund dan Inter sama-sama menatap duel ini dengan modal kemenangan dalam dua laga terakhir.
Dortmund baru saja berturut-turut menaklukkan Borussia Monchengladbach 2-1 di ajang DFB Pokal dan menang 3-0 menjamu Wolfsburg di Bundesliga. Gol perdana Thorgan Hazard, finishing Raphael Guerreiro, serta penalti Mario Gotze membawa Dortmund menumbangkan Wolfsburg dan mendongkrak kepercayaan diri jelang laga kontra sang wakil Italia.
Sementara itu, Inter berturut-turut menang dengan skor identik 2-1 atas tuan rumah Brescia dan Bologna di Serie A. Lautaro Martinez mencetak satu gol dalam dua laga Inter tersebut, sedangkan Romelu Lukaku menyumbang tiga.
text:
Live Streaming of Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan in Vidio
05 Nov 2019, 23:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund host Inter Milan in the fourth phase of the Champions League group 2019-20 matchday at Signal Iduna Park on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs.
Borussia Dortmund carried the mission of retaliation when serving Inter Milan. On the previous matchday, Dortmund surrendered 0-2 at the Inter headquarters. Goals from Lautaro Martinez and Antonio Candreva forced Dortmund to fall before Inter.
Dortmund and Inter are both looking at this duel with a capital of victory in the last two matches.
Dortmund have just successively conquered Borussia Monchengladbach 2-1 in the DFB Pokal and won 3-0 to host Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga. Thorgan Hazard's inaugural goal, Raphael Guerreiro's finishing, and Mario Gotze's penalty led Dortmund to subvert Wolfsburg and boost confidence ahead of the match against the Italian representative.
Meanwhile, Inter won consecutive with a score of identical 2-1 over hosts Brescia and Bologna in Serie A. Lautaro Martinez scored one goal in the two Inter matches, while Romelu Lukaku contributed three.
